mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PARTY (P_NO, TITLE, ID, CAT_MAIN, CAT_SUB, CONTENT, REGION, TAG, PHOTO, PRICE) VALUES(SEQ_PARTY.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{id}, #{cat_main}, #{cat_sub}, #{content}, #{region}, #{tag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price, jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.update: UPDATE PARTY SET TITLE = #{title}, CAT_MAIN = #{cat_main}, CAT_SUB = #{cat_sub}, CONTENT = #{content}, TAG = #{tag, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHOTO = #{photo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRICE = #{price, jdbcType=NUMERIC} WHERE P_NO = #{p_no}
